name: aks-hands-on
postCreateCommand: set -e; NAME=$(git config user.username || true); if [ -z "$NAME" ]; then NAME="anon-$(openssl rand -hex 2)"; fi; NAME=$(echo "$NAME" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr -cs 'a-z0-9' '-'); echo "export AWS_REGION=ap-northeast-1" >> ~/.bashrc; echo "export TF_VAR_name_prefix=eks-hands-on-${NAME}" >> ~/.bashrc; echo "export AWS_REGION=ap-northeast-1" >> ~/.zshrc; echo "export TF_VAR_name_prefix=eks-hands-on-${NAME}" >> ~/.zshrc; echo "export AWS_REGION=ap-northeast-1" | sudo tee /etc/profile.d/eks-hands-on.sh >/dev/null; echo "export TF_VAR_name_prefix=eks-hands-on-${NAME}" | sudo tee -a /etc/profile.d/eks-hands-on.sh >/dev/null; sudo chmod 644 /etc/profile.d/eks-hands-on.sh
